alfredsnippet.snippet:
Jacques Barzun, Science: the glorious entertainment, p.101

"Nature is but a vast blank screen upon which the experimenter throws his abstractions and hypotheses, seeing no more –- as modern man and specialist –- than the minute system of his metaphors and his inferences."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Barzun on Specialization - Part 3
